verbose_text: From confocal laser scanning microscopy (CLSM) experiments to measure permeation, there was evidence that the UTMD downregulated the expression of the tight junction protein, zonula occludens-1 (ZO-1), in groups 4 and 5, but no alteration in the other groups was observed.
evidence: expression of the tight junction protein, zonula occludens-1 (ZO-1
